title: 如何在curseforge上下载光影
author: 永恒之霜
txt_content:
光影包在哪里啊，只有个材质包，还有好多英语看不懂啊啊啊啊，
推荐几款光影呗，还有材质包

replies.author: wwwabcdefgggg
replies.txt_content:
curseforge上发布的光影，一般标题带Shaders的就是
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/customization/configuration
optifine给的外链
https://shaders.fandom.com/wiki/Shader_Packs
可以看到显卡，版本，和更新日期

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum-texture-1.html
你可以来咱论坛里找 有搬运国外的材质和光影

推荐的话
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-860071-1-1.html
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-848955-1-1.html

replies.txt_content:

建议站内
我还是想自己找
